DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine cell change endotracheal intubation artificial lung ventilation affect lung inflammation . Patients undergo placement endotracheal tube ( ETT ) standard care . Tracheal ( windpipe ) lavage obtain day 72 hour . Lung sample fiberoptic ( lung ) sample collect time interval possible do standard care . Blood sample obtain simultaneous collection trachael ( windpipe ) specimens .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Ages 18 85 2 . Required endotracheal intubation 3 . Admitted intensive care unit Exclusion Criteria 1 . On immunosuppressive medication 2 . Previous tracheal surgery 3 . On azithromycin 4 . Pregnancy 5 . Cancer
